synopsis.text:
Train Station of Death is not the final stop for one fortunate soul who, despite being expelled from the cycle of reincarnation due to a mysterious sin, is granted a second chance at life. Reluctantly, the soul finds itself inhabiting the body of Makoto Kobayashi, a troubled 14-year-old boy who recently took his own life. With only six months to uncover the greatest sin from its past life, the soul embarks on an emotional journey to understand the complexities of human emotions and actions.

As the soul navigates through Makoto's fractured family and daily struggles, it begins to unravel the intricate web of pain and suffering that led the boy to commit suicide. With the guidance of a neutral spirit named Purapura, the soul must not only decipher its own sinful past but also learn to appreciate the beauty of life in this new world.

Based on an award-winning novel by Mori Eto, this poignant anime explores the delicate balance of human connections and the importance of understanding one's true self in a world filled with colorful distractions. Can the soul overcome its own dark past and help mend the broken life of Makoto before time runs out? Join the soul on this emotional rollercoaster as it seeks redemption and a newfound appreciation for life.
